body.p: The playbook playbooks/install_sysdig.yml is used to automate the configuration of the SaaS setup. By default, the playbook is commented out in site.yml and must be explicitly enabled. An access key variable must be set in the group_vars/vault file as detailed in .

row.entry: This is your access key for the Sysdig portal

body.note: You must have outgoing port 6666 open in your firewall, to allow data to flow to collector.sysdigcloud.com
body.p: Using the Sysdig software as a solution (SaaS) website , you are able to view, analyze and inspect various different dashboards.
